categories.name: Blemish Control
categories.description: Retinol can help, but fragrance and potential irritants could trigger sensitivities.

categories.name: Hydration
categories.description: Contains hyaluronic acid and glycerin for added moisture.

categories.name: Smooth Texture
categories.description: Retinol and hyaluronic acid can smooth skin over time.

suggestion.title: Gentle Suggestion
suggestion.description: Consider using a small amount initially or patch-testing due to sensitivity concerns.
